alert.note: Alert for Norton (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 25 at 6:28PM CDT until August 25 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Norton County in northwestern Kansas... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 627 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northwest of Almena, or 8 miles north of Norton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Mesonet. The Norton Airport reported a 60 mph wind gust. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Almena around 635 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
